Insight.NAME: Insight
Insight.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, shuffle an Inspiration into your draw pile.
Insight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, shuffle an Inspiration into your draw pile.

Inspiration.NAME: Inspiration
Inspiration.DESCRIPTION: When drawn, draw 2 cards and Exhaust.

Evade.NAME: Evade
Evade.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, gain [E] [E].

Daydream.NAME: Daydream
Daydream.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle !M! Inspiration into your draw pile.

Overpower.NAME: Overpower
Overpower.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, plus 1 for every !M! points of health you currently have.

DarkPact.NAME: Dark Pact
DarkPact.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Plated Armor. NL Shuffle a Regret into your draw pile.

Roost.NAME: Roost
Roost.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL Increase this cards cost by 1 for the rest of combat.

HuntressEssence.NAME: Huntress Essence
HuntressEssence.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP and draw !M! card for each card in your Exhaust pile. NL Exhaust
HuntressEssence.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP and draw !M! cards for each card in your Exhaust pile. NL Exhaust

MachineEssence.NAME: Machine Essence
MachineEssence.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you receive healing, heal an additional !M! HP.

WarriorEssence.NAME: Warrior Essence
WarriorEssence.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! X times. Heal equal to half the unblocked damage dealt. NL Exhaust.

FakeOut.NAME: Fake Out
FakeOut.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Swap your draw pile and discard pile.

Hexing.NAME: Hexing
Hexing.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, apply 2 Weak and 1 Vulnerable to all enemies that don't intend to attack.

Redirect.NAME: Redirect
Redirect.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to !M! times your Strength, then lose all Strength. NL Wither 1.
